title: ellAm shivamayam
sahitya:
ellAm shivamayam ellAm shivamayam ellAm shivamayamE
ellAm shaktimayam ellAm shaktimayam ellAm shaktimayamE


anupallavi

  kallellAm pullellAm kADu malaiyellAm uLLum puramum inguLLadum illadum


caraNam    viNNin shuDarellAm maNnin malarellAm kaNNurum kATSiyellAm
eNNi eNNi idayattil �idu�venruNarndiDum inbamellAm puNNiya 
jnAap-pulavar arinda poruLum aruLumellAm vaNNa uruvum 
aruvum guruvumAi vAcAmagOcaramAga viLangiDum
